name: LOST TAMIA: DUNGEON INTRUDER
description:
In this abandoned land, the ancient devil is about to wake up. In order to save the endangered Tamia continent, explorers began the journey of awakening the goddess Tamia.
Dispel the darkness! Learn skills, collect resources, obtain equipment, and become a great hero to save the world! Time is running out!
Only the goddess Tamia can defeat the Demon King. The journey was long and full of crises. don't worry. No matter how far you go, the friends in the town will help you. They will provide the best medicine and equipment, so let's take a risk! Go through mountains and rainforests, and even find the legendary spirit!
Do not throw away any unknown equipment but take it to the identifier. Wait! This is probably the legendary anchor cultural relic! Different equipment should be used to deal with different enemies. Before starting the battle, please carefully understand the enemy's attributes and attack the enemy's weaknesses!
Rags to riches, all Monsters drop epic equipment!
Thousands of attributes, create your unique build!
Break the dungeon, illuminate the darkness with skills!
All items can be traded, the price is up to you!
